name: UnifiedAttribute
description: The unified attribute for the Needle Overlay

content.name: x
content.description:
the X position of the button
default: 0.0

content.name: y
content.description:
the Y position of the button
default: 0.0

content.name: angle
content.description:
the angle of the button
default: 0.0

content.name: width
content.description:
the width of the button
default: 120.0

content.name: height
content.description:
the height of the button
default: 60.0

content.name: needle_width
content.description:
the width of a needle
default: 0.25

content.name: needle_invisible_handle_width
content.description:
the width of a needle's "invisible handle", or the invisible area in which a mouse action will be registered
default: 1.0

content.name: point_needle_colour
content.description:
the colour of a point needle
default: {r:0.94, g:0.94, b:0.94, a:1.0}

content.name: area_needle_colour
content.description:
the colour of an area needle
default: {r:1.0, g:0.9, b:0.44, a:1.0}

content.name: area_body_colour
content.description:
the colour of an area body
default: {r:1.0, g:0.9, b:0.44, a:0.5}

content.name: allow_wrapping
content.description:
allow an area's body to wrap around the ends of the needle overlay space (creating a loop)
default: false

content.name: points_interactable
content.description:
allow point needles to be interacted with
default: true

content.name: areas_interactable
content.description:
allow areas to be interacted with
default: true
